AccessoriesAdded(address[]).details: Accessories can only be added by contract owner

AccessoriesRemoved((address,uint8)[],uin.details: Accessories can only be removed by the Snowman owner

AccessoryAdded(address).details: Accessory can only be added by contract owner

AccessoryRemoved(address,uint256).details: Accessory can only be removed by the Snowman owner

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

addAccessory(address,uint8).details: Can only be added by contract owner

params.position: Determines which position(Foreground or Background) to place the accessory

isAccessoryAvailable(address).details: The contract owner determines if accessory is available or not

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeAccessory(address,uint256).details: Can only be removed by the Snowman owner

params.snowmanId: Id of Snowman to remove accessory from

removeAllAccessories(uint256).details: Can only be removed by the Snowman owner

params.snowmanId: Id of snowman to remove all accessories from

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

AccessoriesAdded(address[]).notice: Emitted when multiple accessories have been added

AccessoriesRemoved((address,uint8)[],uin.notice: Emitted when an accessory is removed from a Snowman

AccessoryAdded(address).notice: Emitted when an accessory has been added

AccessoryRemoved(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when an accessory is removed from a Snowman

accessoryId(address,uint256).notice: Returns the id of accessory added to a snowman

addAccessory(address,uint8).notice: Adds an accessory to Snowman for composition by Snowman owners

getFeeCollector().notice: Retrieves the current mint fee collector

hasAccessory(address,uint256).notice: Returns `true` if an accessory has been added to a Snowman and `false` otherwise

isAccessoryAvailable(address).notice: Returns `true` if accessory is available for composition and `false` otherwise

mint().notice: Mints one snowman with dynamic attributes for 0.02 ETH

removeAccessory(address,uint256).notice: Removes an accessory from a Snowman

removeAllAccessories(uint256).notice: Removes all accessories from a Snowman

renderTokenById(uint256).notice: Returns the SVG image of Snowman

setFeeCollector(address).notice: Sets a new mint fee collector

withdrawFees().notice: Withdraws mint fees to fee collector's account

userdoc.notice: Mint a unique snowman and compose with other accessories(NFTs) approved by the admin.
